item.title: hugo academic theme blog down deployment (some details)
item.description: I have been following this tutorial from Alison and tips from Leslie Myint for some customization for deploying my blogdown website It is quites straighforward to have a working site following Alison’s guide. However, you always want some customization of your own site. I took the tips from Leslie. changed the menue bar to black. I like it better than the default white. in the config.toml file, change the theme:
